text:
Tiger to perform Kalaripayattu

Tiger Shroff, who is prepping for his second film Baaghi: A Rebel For Love , has said he will be peforming kalaripayattu in the movie.

“I underwent extensive training in Kalaripayattu before we started shoot as the martial art form is an important part of the film. It was a thoroughly enriching experience,” said the Heropanti actor.

Kalaripayattu is ancient martial art form of Kerala.

Directed by Sabbir Khan, Baaghi also stars Shraddha Kapoor. — ANI
title: Tiger Shroff to perform Kalaripayattu in 'Baaghi: A Rebel For Love'
